# init(coder:device:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an L2-norm pooling filter.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(coder aDecoder: NSCoder, device: any MTLDevice)
```

## Initializers

- **init(device:kernelWidth:kernelHeight:strideInPixelsX:strideInPixelsY:)**: Initializes an L2-norm pooling filter.
